attrs.name: page-size
attrs.desc: Number of items displayed on each page. The .sync modifier is supported.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 10.

attrs.name: is-before-page-change
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to enable the pre-processing feature when the page is changed. When the value is true, the operation of turning pages or changing the page size does not take effect immediately. Instead, the service logic is processed by the user. Then, the reserved callback or rollback is invoked to make the operation take effect or invalid. For details, see the before-page-change event

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert a pop-up box to the body element. If an error occurs in locating a fault in the dialog box that is displayed, set this attribute to false (for details, see the select component).
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: page-count
attrs.desc: Total number of pages. You can set either total or page-count to display the page number. If you want to support page-sizes changes, you need to use the total attribute

attrs.name: pager-count
attrs.desc: Maximum number of page buttons to be displayed in the middle in number/complete mode. Number of page buttons. When the total number of pages exceeds the value, the buttons will be collapsed. The value of this attribute can be an odd number ranging from 5 to 21
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 7.

attrs.name: current-page
attrs.desc: Number of current pages. The .sync modifier is supported.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 1

attrs.name: layout
attrs.desc: Component layout. Subcomponent names are separated by commas (,). The optional value of this attribute is sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper, ->, total, slot
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is prev, pager, next, jumper, ->, total

attrs.name: page-sizes
attrs.desc: Set the number of records that can be displayed on each page. Option settings of the number of display items per page selector
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is [10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 100]

attrs.name: prev-text
attrs.desc: Substitute the text on the previous page of the icon.

attrs.name: next-text
attrs.desc: Substitute the text on the next page of the icon.

attrs.name: hide-on-single-page
attrs.desc: Whether to hide only one page

attrs.name: mode
attrs.desc: Set the pagination display mode. The default value is number. Set the pagination display mode. The optional values of this attribute are number / simple / complete / fixed

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Define the pager size. The value of this attribute can be mini

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false

slots.name: default
slots.desc: User-defined content. Slots must be listed in the layout.

events.name: before-page-change
events.desc:
This event is triggered when the pre-processing feature is enabled when the page is changed and the page turning or page size is changed. ; / / Parameter arg
 {$grid: VueComponent, //table component vue instance 
currentPage: 1 // Current page number 
layout: 'total, prev, pager, next, jumper, sizes' / / Current paging component layout information 
pageSize: 10 // Number of records displayed on each page. 
pageSizes: [5, 10] //Number of records that can be switched on each page.
total: 10 //Total number of records}

events.name: size-change
events.desc: Set the event after pagination. This event is triggered when pageSize changes. arg1: pageSize new current value

events.name: current-change
events.desc: This event is triggered when the currentPage changes. arg1: new current page value

events.name: prev-click
events.desc: This event is triggered when a user clicks the previous button to change the current page. arg1: new current page value

events.name: next-click
events.desc: This event is triggered when a user clicks Next to change the current page. arg1: Number New current page value
